name: Baked Salmon
steps: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees.
Spread the olive oil around a glass baking dish.
Add the salmon, Garlic, and pine nuts to the dish
Bake for 15 minutes.
Add the Butternut Squash and put back in the oven for 30 mins.
Remove from oven and let cool for 15 minutes. Add the lettuce and serve.

name: Fish Tacos
steps: Cook the Fish on the Grill until Hot
Place the fish on the 3 tortillas
Top them with lettuce, tomatos, and cheese

name: Egg and Cheese sandwich
steps: Heat pan to medium-high.
Beat eggs, salt, and pepper into a small mixing bowl.
Pour mixture into pan, reduce heat to medium.
Spread butter onto 1 side of each bread slide.
Fold egg mixture in half.
Place 1 slide of bread butter side down on the open portion of the pan.
Set 1 slide of cheese onto top of bread.
When mixture has solidified 90%, flip onto the top of bread/cheese.
Immediately place other cheese slice ontop of eggs followed by the other bread slide, butter side up.
Wait a minute or 2 and flip over.
Wait 3-5 minutes or until brown to your liking. Remove and serve.

name: Yogurt Parfait
steps: Put yogurt of your flavor into a small bowl.
Layer honey on top.
Cover honey with granola.
Sprinkle blueberries last.

name: Pasta medley
steps: Bring 5 qts of water to a pot or per packaging specifications.
Heat a skillet on medium-high. Add olive oil.
Dump sausage into skillet.
When water rapidly boils, add pasta and stir immediately.
After a few minutes, stir sausages and pasta occasionally.
When sausage is half way done, add spinach.
Turn off heat on skillet when spinach is fully cooked down.
Drain pasta in a colander when tender.
Put pasta back in pot. Add pesto, sausage/spinach mix, and garlic salt. Stir well.
Serve on a pasta bowl. Layer with cheese.

name: Quesadilla
steps: Heat pan to medium. Add olive oil.
Place tortilla onto pan.
Dump sausage into skillet.
When water rapidly boils, add pasta and stir immediately.
After a few minutes, stir sausages and pasta occasionally.
When sausage is half way done, add spinach.
Turn off heat on skillet when spinach is fully cooked down.
Drain pasta in a colander when tender.
Put pasta back in pot. Add pesto, sausage/spinach mix, and garlic salt. Stir well.
Serve on a pasta bowl. Layer with cheese.

name: Campfire baked potatoe
steps: Make a fire until coals are hot.
Cut potatoe lengthwise but only halfway deep.
Fill potatoe with butter and salt.
Wrap in foil and set on a grate or on coals.
Wait 20 minutes. Remove from heat and wait 5 more minutes.
Unwrap, fill with sour cream, and serve.
